briefTitle: Study Comparing 80 mg of Adalimumab With Placebo, and Demonstrating the Non-inferiority of Monthly 80 mg Adalimumab Dosing Compared With 40 mg Adalimumab Every Other Week Dosing
officialTitle: A Multi-center, Randomized, Double-blind,Placebo-controlled Study Comparing 80 mg of Adalimumab With Placebo, and Demonstrating the Non-inferiority of Monthly 80 mg Adalimumab Dosing Compared With 40 mg Adalimumab Every Other Week Dosing
summary: To demonstrate the efficacy of 80 mg adalimumab monthly dosing compared with placebo and demonstrate the non-inferiority of monthly dosing of 80 mg adalimumab compared with dosing of 40 mg adalimumab every other week.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Number of Responders According to the American College of Rheumatology (ACR) 20 Response Criteria at Week 12 Involving the Comparison of Adalimumab 80 mg Monthly Dose Versus Placebo and Adalimumab 40 mg Every Other Week (Eow)
